title: New: Kodak To Graph – Rakshasa (Feat. Monsoonsiren)
body:
Rapidly becoming a household name, **Kodak To Graph** is one of the most vibrant young producers around at the present moment.

On his latest track, _Rakshasa_ (a Hindu term for an unrighteous spirit – or man-eater) which features the vocal talents of **Monsoonsiren**, he experiments with splicing up numerous samples, all that ultimately inject a real life and energy into the composition. In terms of what **Kodak To Graph** is achieving at the moment, there are few doing it better.
